english.question: Which sentence uses the correct comparative form?
options: He is cleverer than his brother.

english.question: Choose the appropriate preposition: 'The book is _____ the table.'

options: If I were you, I would study hard.

english.question: Identify the correct use of a semicolon:
options: She was tired; however, she finished her work.
She was tired; however she; finished her work.
She was tired however; she finished her work.
She was tired, however; she finished her work.

english.question: Choose the correct passive form: 'People speak English all over the world.'
options: English was spoken all over the world.
English is spoken all over the world.
English is speaked all over the world.
English are spoken all over the world.
